Initial Ignorance.quote: "Once I was blind, but now I see." (John 9:25)

First Contact.quote: "Before I formed you in the womb I knew you." (Jeremiah 1:5)

Divine Recognition.quote: "My sheep hear my voice, and I know them." (John 10:27)

Spiritual Awakening.quote: "Awake, O sleeper, and arise from the dead." (Ephesians 5:14)

Inner Calling.quote: "Deep calls to deep at the roar of your waterfalls." (Psalm 42:7)

Initial Response.quote: "Here I am! I stand at the door and knock." (Revelation 3:20)

First Turning.quote: "Return to me, and I will return to you." (Malachi 3:7)

Early Aspiration.quote: "As the deer pants for streams of water, so my soul pants for you." (Psalm 42:1)

Beginning Trust.quote: "Trust in the LORD with all your heart." (Proverbs 3:5)

Initial Dedication.quote: "You will seek me and find me when you seek me with all your heart." (Jeremiah 29:13)

Growing Faith.quote: "Faith comes by hearing, and hearing by the word of God." (Romans 10:17)

Deepening Connection.quote: "Draw near to God and He will draw near to you." (James 4:8)

Progressive Understanding.quote: "Then you will understand the fear of the LORD and find the knowledge of God." (Proverbs 2:5)

Inner Purification.quote: "Create in me a pure heart, O God." (Psalm 51:10)

Spiritual Testing.quote: "The refining pot is for silver and the furnace for gold." (Proverbs 17:3)

Divine Patience.quote: "Be still before the LORD and wait patiently for him." (Psalm 37:7)

Growing Intimacy.quote: "The secret of the LORD is with those who fear Him." (Psalm 25:14)

Increasing Surrender.quote: "Not my will, but yours be done." (Luke 22:42)

Deepening Trust.quote: "Though he slay me, yet will I trust in him." (Job 13:15)

Divine Partnership.quote: "We are laborers together with God." (1 Corinthians 3:9)

Stable Connection.quote: "Abide in me, and I in you." (John 15:4)

Divine Friendship.quote: "No longer do I call you servants... but I have called you friends." (John 15:15)

Complete Trust.quote: "I know whom I have believed." (2 Timothy 1:12)

Perfect Alignment.quote: "Let this mind be in you which was also in Christ Jesus." (Philippians 2:5)

Divine Communion.quote: "Our fellowship is with the Father and with his Son." (1 John 1:3)

Ultimate Oneness.quote: "That they all may be one; as thou, Father, art in me, and I in thee." (John 17:21)
